property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may choose any number of light and/or darkness spells that have total cost 4 or less and put them into your graveyard. Then shuffle your deck. Cast all of the chosen spells for no cost. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your creatures that has Command in its race. When you put this creature into the battle zone, return any number of creatures from your graveyard to your hand. Double breaker When this creature leaves the battle zone, you may put a psychic creature that costs 7 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone.

card.name: Storm Genji Double Cross, the Super Temporal

property.name: Rules
property.value: Super Infinite evolution - Put this creature on any number of psychic creature(s) that have total cost 20 or more. Whenever you put psychic creatures into the battle zone or awaken them, you may put this creature from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. Meteorburn Awaken - At the start of your turn, put all cards under this creature into your graveyard and flip this creature to its higher cost side. Quattro breaker

alternate.name: Last Storm Double Cross, the Super Awakened

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever your opponent would choose a creature in the battle zone, he can"t choose this one. (It can still be attacked and blocked.) Whenever this creature attacks, you may put any number of psychic creatures that cost 10 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. World breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your creatures that has Command in its race. When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put one of your psychic creatures that costs 7 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. When this creature leaves the battle zone, you may put any number of cards from your graveyard into your mana zone. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Blocker This creature can"t attack. Whenever your opponent would choose a creature due to the ability of a creature, this creature can"t be chosen. Awaken - At the start of your turn, you may choose 3 of your cards from the battle zone and/or your mana zone , return them to your deck, and then shuffle it. If you do, flip this creature. :Evil Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature attacks, destroy one of your opponent"s Light creatures, Water creatures, Darkness creatures, Fire creatures, and Nature creatures. {RELEASE} Quattro breaker (This creature breaks 4 shields.) :Evil Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: Awaken - At the start of your turn, if you have 3 or more creatures that have "500" as the last 3 digits of their power in the battle zone, flip this creature. This creature can"t be attacked by fire creatures. :Holy Soul

alternate.name: Lightning Five Star, Heavenly Luck Awakened

property.name: Rules
property.value: All your other creatures win all battles. Double breaker :Holy Soul

card.name: K Atlantis, Ocean Peak of Taiga

property.name: Rules
property.value: This creature can"t be blocked. Double breaker When this creature is destroyed, return all of your opponent"s creatures in the battle zone to their owner"s hands.

card.name: Million Death, Lord of a Hundred Beasts

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your creatures that has "Monster" in its race. When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put any number of creatures that has "Monster" in its race from your mana zone into your graveyard. For each creature put into your graveyard in this way, your opponent chooses one of his creatures and destroys it. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Awaken - At the end of your turn, if all of your creatures in the battle zone are tapped, flip this creature. Double breaker Hyperspatial Psychic

alternate.name: Crimson GENJI Double Cross, the Swordmaster Awakened

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature attacks, destroy all your opponent"s creatures that have "Blocker". Double breaker When this creature would leave the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your graveyard. If that card is a Fire Bird this creature stays in the battle zone and you may put a fire psychic creature that costs 7 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) Evolution - Put on one of your creatures that has the same soul as this creature. Whenever this creature attacks, you may discard 2 creatures that share a soul with this creature from your hand. If you do, untap this creature. Double breaker :Holy Soul:Magic Soul:Evil Soul:Kung Fu Soul:Wild Soul:Bloody Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the end of your turn, if you have 3 or fewer shields, you may discard a creature from your hand. If you do, add the top card of your deck to your shields face down.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} When you put this creature into the battle zone, all cards of the next shield you return to your hand get "Shield Trigger" this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your water creatures may each cost 1 less to summon. They can"t cost less than 1. Awaken - At the end of your turn, if you summoned 3 or more creatures that turn, flip this creature. Double breaker Hyperspatial Psychic:Magic Soul

alternate.name: Ocean G Hogan, the Best Awakened

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you summon a creature, look at the top card of your deck. If that card is a creature, you may put it into the battle zone. Double breaker:Magic Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the end of your turn, you may discard a creature from your hand. If you do, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Put one of these into your hand, one on the bottom of your deck and one on the top of your deck. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may draw a card for each of your psychic creatures in the battle zone. Whenever one of your creatures that has "Awakened" in its name attacks this turn, you may return one of your opponent"s creatures in the battle zone to its owner"s hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent"s tapped creatures. Awaken - At the end of your opponent"s turn, if your opponent has no cards in his hand, flip this creature. :Bloody Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature attacks, your opponent chooses a card in his hand and discards it, then chooses one of his creatures and destroys it. Double breaker :Bloody Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the end of your turn, you may discard a creature from your hand. If you do, destroy one of your opponent"s creatures that costs less than the creature you discarded.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy all your opponent"s Fire Birds.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Speed attacker Whenever this creature wins a battle, break 3 of your opponent"s shields. Double breaker :Kung Fu Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever your opponent puts a card from his deck or graveyard into his mana zone, your opponent chooses a card in his mana zone and puts it on the bottom of his deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap Ability Destroy one of your Fire Birds or Dragons. You may put a Dragon or Fire Bird that costs the same as or 1 more than the destroyed creature from your hand into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Awaken - At the end of your turn, if you put a creature that has power 7000 or more into the battle zone this turn, flip this creature. Double breaker Hyperspatial Psychic :Wild Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each of your other creatures in the battle zone gets +2000 power and can"t be blocked by creatures that have less power than it. Triple breaker :Wild Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your creatures that have "Mana Reburst" in your mana zone may cost up to 2 less to summon. They can"t cost less than 1. Double breaker : Wild Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature is destroyed, you may put it from your graveyard on the bottom of your deck. If you do, put a non-evolution creature that has "Reaper" in its name from your graveyard into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy one of your opponent"s creatures. Your opponent discards 2 cards from his hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Instead of having this creature attack, you may tap this creature and 4 untapped cards in your mana zone to use its ability: If you don"t have a psychic creature that has "GENJI Double Cross" in its name in the battle zone, put a GENJI Double Cross, Temporal Swordsman from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. When this creature would be destroyed, you may put it on the top of your deck instead.

property.value: During your turn, whenever another creature enters the battle zone, this creature gets "Power Attacker +6000" and breaks an additional shield until the end of the turn. :Wild Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mana Reburst 0 (You may summon this creature from your mana zone for no cost.) When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you summoned it from your mana zone, put a nature card from your mana zone into your graveyard. If you can"t, destroy this creature. :Wild Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each of your creatures in the battle zone gets +4000 power and breaks an additional shield until the end of the turn. Until the end of the turn, whenever one of your creatures is attacking your opponent and becomes blocked, it breaks one of your opponent"s shields. Until the end of the turn, if your opponent would choose a creature in the battle zone for the effect of a spell, he can"t choose one of your creatures.

property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent"s creatures in the battle zone. During your opponent"s next turn, that creature attacks if able. (A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.)
